meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Again</kanji> with that <kanji>occurrence</kanji>? That occurrence has now happened <vocabulary>again</vocabulary>.

Note that this word is relatively formal.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Just remember that there's a い hiding in there!
